photosynthesis: Ke kaʻina hana e hoʻohana ai nā mea kanu i ka lā, ka wai, a me CO2 e hana ai i ka meaʻai (glucose)
hanu kelepona: Ke kaʻina hana e wāwahi ai nā cell i ka glucose e hoʻokuʻu i ka ikehu
mitochondria: ʻO nā organelles i loko o nā pūnaewele ke kuleana no ka hanu cellular
chlorophyll: ʻO ka puaʻa ʻōmaʻomaʻo i loko o nā mea kanu e hoʻopaʻa i ka lā no ka photosynthesis
DNA: Deoxyribonucleic acid, mole e lawe ana i ka ʻike genetic
rna: ʻO ka waikawa Ribonucleic, ka mole i komo i ka synthesis protein
p\u016bmua: Molecule i hana ʻia me nā amino acids, e hana ana i nā hana like ʻole o ke kino
enzyme: ʻO ka protein e hoʻolalelale ana i nā hana kemika i loko o ke kino
p\u016b\u02bbali koa: ʻĀpana kumu o ke ola, ʻo ke kahua kūkulu kumu o nā mea ola a pau
kikokiko: E hana pū ana nā pūʻulu like e hana i kahi hana kikoʻī
kinona: E hana pū ana ka hui o nā ʻiʻo e hana i kahi hana kikoʻī
\u02bb\u014dnaehana \u02bb\u014dkana: Ka hui o nā ʻōkana e hana pū ana i kahi hana paʻakikī
homeostasis: Ka hiki i ke kino ke mālama i ka nohona paʻa o loko
ho\u02bbopilikino: Hoʻololi i loko o kahi mea ola e kōkua iā ia e ola a hoʻohua hou i kona kaiapuni
ho\u02bbomohala \u02bbana: Ke kaʻina hana e loli ai ka nui o nā mea ola i ka manawa
koho k\u016blohelohe: ʻO ke kaʻina hana e ola ai nā mea ola me nā ʻano i kūpono i ko lākou kaiapuni
kaiaola: E aʻo i ke ʻano o ka launa pū ʻana o nā meaola me kekahi a me ko lākou kaiapuni
kaiaolaola: Ke kaiāulu o nā mea ola a me ko lākou kaiapuni ola ʻole e launa pū kekahi me kekahi
biosphere: Māhele o ka Honua e kākoʻo ana i ke ola
\u02bbauhau \u02bbauhau: ʻO ka lālā o ka biology pili i ka hoʻokaʻawale ʻana i nā mea ola
morphology: ʻO ka lālā o ka biology pili i ke aʻo ʻana i ke ʻano a me ke ʻano
physiology: ʻO ka lālā o ka biology pili i ke aʻo ʻana i ka hana a me nā kaʻina hana i loko o nā mea ola
autotroph: Hiki ke hana i kāna meaʻai ponoʻī me ka hoʻohana ʻana i ka māmā a i ʻole kemika (e laʻa, nā mea kanu)
heterotroph: Mea kino e loaʻa ai ka meaʻai ma ka ʻai ʻana i nā mea ola ʻē aʻe (e laʻa, holoholona)
mea hana: Mea kino e hoʻopuka ana i nā mea ola (e laʻa, nā mea kanu)
mea k\u016b\u02bbai: Mea kino e hoʻopau ana i nā mea olaola i hana ʻia e nā mea ola ʻē aʻe (e laʻa, nā holoholona)
decomposer: ʻO ke kino e wāwahi ana i nā meaola make a me nā mea ola (e laʻa, nā haʻiki, bacteria)
wahi noho: ʻO ke kaiapuni kūlohelohe o ke kino
heluna kanaka: Hui o na mea ola o ka ano like e noho ana ma kekahi wahi
kaiaulu: Pūʻulu o nā lāhui like ʻole e launa pū ana kekahi i kekahi ma kekahi wahi
biome: Pūnaehana kaiaola nui me nā mea kanu a me nā holoholona (e laʻa, wao nahele, nahele ua)
mea olaola: Nā ʻano like ʻole o ke ola ma ka Honua ma nā pae āpau, mai nā genes a i nā kaiaola
pilikia: Nā ʻano ʻano i ka pōʻino o ka pau ʻana
pau loa: Nā ʻano ʻano ʻaʻole e noho hou ana
